Collectibles - Setup Objects

Lets add an object for the player to collect in the game. We will use a rare gem.

We will need both a full size sprite and a HUD sprite that is smaller. Right click on the Sprites title in the Resources menu and select Create Sprite. Press the Import button and navigate to Included Files | TutorialResources | Sprites | spr_gem.png in the browser (or click here). Name the sprite spr_gem.

Repeat the above and import spr_gem_hud.png naming it spr_gem_hud:

Now we have a lot of sprites in our sprites folder, lets clean them up. Right click on the Sprites title in the Resources menu and select Add Group. Call it Player. Drag the 6 player sprites into the folder.

Organize the rest of the sprite folder to your liking.

Organize your game objects into groups as well.

Add a new Game Object and call it obj_gem and bind spr_gem to it and place it in a logical group:

Add a new Game Object and call it obj_gem_hud and bind spr_gem_hud to it and place it in a logical group:

Next up we will be placing these in the room and collecting them.
